result.execSummary:
The defendant Stevon L. Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Stevon L. Jones is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Stevon L. Jones was found guilty of Stalking, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.
*   Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*   Submit to a DNA sample and pay surcharge.
DOC shall promptly notify the court of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the deft.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Andrea Rufo.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 2-1/2yrs WSP; initial confinement of one year followed by 18mos of ES.  See ES conditions.  Credit for 18 days.  Deft not eligible for CIP or SAP.  Appeal rights.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment.  Bond to be applied towards financial obligations.  Balance may be returned to poster.
